targets.expr: jvm_metrics_mem_heap_used_m{job=~"$job", hbase_cluster=~"$hbase_cluster", instance=~"$instance", processname="RegionServer"} / clamp_min(jvm_metrics_mem_heap_committed_m{job=~"$job", hbase_cluster=~"$hbase_cluster", instance=~"$instance", processname="RegionServer"}, 1)

panels.title: JVM heap memory usage
